32 class SurfaceKernel : public PatchKernel {
33 
34 public:
35  // Static constant
36  static const unsigned short SELECT_TRIANGLE;
37  static const unsigned short SELECT_QUAD;
38  static const unsigned short SELECT_ALL;
39  static const std::map<ElementType, unsigned short> m_selectionTypes;
40 
41  // Types definitions
42  typedef double (SurfaceKernel::*eval_f_)(long, int &) const;
43 
44  void setSpaceDimension(int dimension);
45  int getSpaceDimension(void) const;
46 
47  virtual ~SurfaceKernel();
48  virtual double evalCellArea(long) const;
49  virtual double evalEdgeLength(long, int) const;
50  virtual double evalMinEdgeLength(long, int &) const;
51  virtual double evalMaxEdgeLength(long, int &) const;
52  virtual double evalAngleAtVertex(long, int) const;
53  virtual double evalMinAngleAtVertex(long, int &) const;
54  virtual double evalMaxAngleAtVertex(long, int &) const;
55  virtual double evalAspectRatio(long, int &) const;
56  virtual std::array<double, 3> evalFacetNormal(long) const;
57  std::array<double, 3> evalEdgeNormal(long, int) const;
58  std::array<double, 3> evalVertexNormal(long, int) const;
59  std::array<double, 3> evalVertexNormal(long, int, std::size_t, const long *) const;
60  std::array<double, 3> evalLimitedVertexNormal(long, int, double ) const;
61  virtual std::array<double, 3> evalLimitedVertexNormal(long, int, std::size_t, const long *, double ) const;
62  double evalCellSize(long id) const override;
63 
64  bool adjustCellOrientation();
65  bool adjustCellOrientation(long id, bool invert = false);
66  void flipCellOrientation(long id);
67 
68  void displayQualityStats(std::ostream&, unsigned int padding = 0) const;
69  std::vector<double> computeHistogram(eval_f_ funct_, std::vector<double> &bins, long &count, int n_intervals = 8, unsigned short mask = SELECT_ALL) const;
70 
71 private:
72  void initialize();
73 
74  bool compareSelectedTypes(unsigned short, ElementType) const;
75  void displayHistogram(long, const std::vector<double>&, const std::vector<double>&, const std::string&, std::ostream&, unsigned int padding = 0) const;
76 
77  bool haveSameOrientation(long cellId_A, int face_A, long cellId_B, int face_B) const;
78 
79 protected:
80  int m_spaceDim;
81 
82 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
83  SurfaceKernel(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert);
84  SurfaceKernel(int patch_dim, int space_dim, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert);
85  SurfaceKernel(int id, int patch_dim, int space_dim, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert);
86 #else
87  SurfaceKernel(bool expert);
88  SurfaceKernel(int patch_dim, int space_dim, bool expert);
89  SurfaceKernel(int id, int patch_dim, int space_dim, bool expert);
90 #endif
91 
92 };

94 }
